CustomField.description: Calculated based on membership level qualification amount, unless a manual override is set, in which case it is based on that value.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( TEXT(Membership_level_Manual_override__c) <> "", OR( TODAY() <= Member_level_manual_override_exp_date__c, ISNULL(Member_level_manual_override_exp_date__c) ) ), CASE(TEXT(Membership_level_Manual_override__c), "Non-member",0, "MinnPost Bronze",1, "MinnPost Silver",2, "MinnPost Gold",3, 4 ), IF( OR( Membership_level_qualification_amount__c = 0, SF_Record_Type__c = "Organization" ),0, IF( Membership_level_qualification_amount__c < 60,1, IF( Membership_level_qualification_amount__c < 120,2, IF( Membership_level_qualification_amount__c < 240,3,4)))) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated based on membership level qualification amount, unless a manual override is set, in which case it is based on that value.
CustomField.label: Membership level number
